text: 27:12 Godɨn Araziba 11:29; Josua 8:33-35“Ia Jordanɨn Fanem giregh vongɨn otivigh gɨvagh, aruer kamra Ikiavɨra Itir God deragh ia damuamin akaba inisɨ, ian anabataba mangɨ, Gerisimɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn tuifigh, kar Simeonɨn anabamɨn adarasi, ko Livain anabamɨn adarasi, ko Juda, ko Isakar, ko Josep ko Benjaminɨn anabamɨn adarasi.
